docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
~/. 📂My Cross-Platform Dotfiles powered by chezmoi

This project provisions my development environment on either Windows or Mac machines. It uses chezmoi to install applications and copy dotfiles to their respective locations. This setup also allows me to use my Yubikey.

docs.title: Setup
docs.text: In the setup folder there is a script to install chezmoi. See more information on chezmoi init and apply here.

docs.title: Bash
docs.text:
./setup/unix.sh

After the chezmoi cli is installed you can init chezmoi and apply the dotfiles.

chezmoi init --apply Stackclash
